specializationDetails.heading: What I Specialized on and Why?
specializationDetails.details: Front-end development is what I specialized on because I thrive on constantly considering the user experience to enhance their day-to-day productivity.

learningDetails.heading: Why learning and keeping up with the latest technology is important to me?
learningDetails.details: In this rapidly advancing technological landscape, I keep my skills up to date by engaging myself in video lectures, studying documentation, and most importantly engaging with side projects.

learningMethods.heading: How I learn new programming languages and framework?
details: In programming or anything in life, the path to perfection lies in practice and repetition. Simply doing the work is one aspect, but the true goal of success is achieved by continually learning and mastering our craft.

There are many programming language and framework out there, but I have chosen to focus on a few. I would rather be an expert on one programming language or framework than to be decent or “good enough” on many of them. Focusing on one programming languages at a time is the key to success.

analogy.heading: Here is my analogy
details: Just like what Bruce Lee said, "I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times."

To apply that in the programming world, I do not acknowledge developers that can write "Hello World" in 10,000 different programming languages and framework, but I acknowledge developers that can build something special from scratch in one programming language and framework.
